alert.note: Alert for Cache Valley, Utah Portion; Eastern Box Elder County; Northern Wasatch Front (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 15 at 9:19PM MST until December 16 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 8 PM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches. * WHERE...Eastern Box Elder County, Northern Wasatch Front and Cache Valley/Utah Portion. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 8 PM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Occasional winter driving conditions are possible, especially Thursday morning and again Thursday evening. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.
